dct_description_sm: the map drawn & engraved by J. Rapkin ; the illustrations by H. Warren & engraved by R. Baker.
Bar scale on map given in "Miles".
Shows topography, drainage, territorial boundaries of the tribes of Israel, travel routes, places of historical interest.
5 pictorial vignettes: [1] Jaffa -- [2] Nazareth -- [3] Natives of Mount Lebanon -- [4] Gazelle -- [5] Pelicans.
